strapiPost.title: Arkansas Ranks 9th In SEC For Athletics Revenue In 2022
strapiPost.content:
The University of Arkansas athletics department ranked 9th in the SEC for revenue gained from athletics after a record-breaking year for finances in 2022, with revenue topping $150m for the first time.

  • Woo pig: Arkansas athletics brought in $152.51m in revenue and reported $144.31m in expenses for an operating surplus of $8.2m. Razorback football contributed over half the revenue at $83.6m.
  • All for athletes: The athletics department funds 470 athletes competing across eight men's and 11 women's teams. The department operates without help from any student fees or taxpayer support.

Read more from Talk Business & Politics HERE.
